name: Circles of Hell (itch)
description:
CONTROLS:

Gamepad:

- Left joystick to move around

- Right joystick to look around

- Right bumper to shoot

Mouse and keyboard:

- WASD to move around

- Move mouse to look around

- Left click to shoot

DISCLAIMER: Switching between both control schemes only goes one way (from gamepad to mouse) while the other way around is not possible in this prototype.

Enjoy my experiment: a top-down shooter/bullet hell where you need to go from elevator to elevator to get to the bottom floor, where you will find all the answers you are looking for...

If you like what you see, leave a comment to let me know what you think and as always, feel free to follow me, I will follow you back!
